I have the T205 American Beauty cards of Becker, Corridon and Phelps for sale.  Cards are crease free with border chipping and corner wear as shown.  Price is $75 each shipped.  Paypal or mailed payment acceptable.  Please reserve at [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url].  

Thanks!

Kevin
